name: Top Down Zombies (ElRioTDev)
description:
Top Down Zombies video game is an exciting indie action game in which players must fight endless hordes of zombies while trying to survive as long as possible. Inspired by the classic game Smash TV, this game features minimalist graphics that give it a retro and distinctive style.

With an exciting soundtrack and addictive gameplay, your minimalist top-down zombie game is a challenging experience that will keep players on edge as they fight to survive in a world infested with zombies. The minimalist graphics give it a retro and distinctive charm, and the game is ideal for players looking for a fun and challenging gaming experience.
